mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberPhone, memberAddress1, memberAddress2, memberGender, memberBirthDate) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddress1}, #{memberAddress2}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirthDate})
INSERT INTO sales (memberId, productNo, salesCount, productPrice) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productNo}, #{salesCount}, #{productPrice})

INSERT INTO product (productName, productCatCode, productDetail, productPrice, productStock, productStatus, productImgSrc) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productCatCode}, #{productDetail}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productStatus}, #{productImgSrc})
INSERT INTO cart (memberId, productNo, productName, salesCount, productPrice) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{salesCount}, #{productPrice})
